scripts.dev: env $(cat .dev.env) yarn workspaces foreach -pvi run dev
scripts.build: yarn workspaces foreach -vi run build && cp -r packages/client/dist packages/server/dist-client
scripts.deploy: scp -r packages/server/{dist,build} qbhub:~/qbhub/packages/server && ssh qbhub 'cd ~/qbhub && git pull && yarn install && pm2 restart qbhub-beta'
